name: Slime Forest
description:
This game was create for the Homa Games Monthly Game Jam. the game is for android.

the objective of the game is to help slimi find his home.

you only have 2 button tab to jump and double jump and swipe down to make a ground pound. at the star of the game you will chose a color and you can only wall and stick to that same color, you can change color picking up color gem.

master the art of jumping and ground poundto take slimi to his home.

this game was make entire by my, im a programmer so the art  is unique , hope you have a little fun whit it.
